Consult with your Compensation and Classification Analyst or Employee and Labor Relations (ELR) Analyst before completing this form. Use the Locate Your Team page to find the appropriate help you need.

Before filling out this form, gather the following information:

  • Employee Name or Employee CruzID
  • Names/CruzIDs of other departmental approvers
  • Desired start date of the action
  • Employee's Current Status (Career, Partial Career, Contract, Limited)
  • Employee's Current Classification
  • Employee's Current Salary
  • Is this a Critical Position?
  • Does this position require a Background Check?
  • Required documentation to attach to request (upload link provided):
    • Current and Proposed Job Description
    • Department Organization Chart

When you submit this request:

  • Compensation will then review the updated job description request
  • Compensation will notify the unit if this needs to be submitted through the classification review process
